en: Hello
This is Torpejo from the Munchers' Guild
We saw your application and have decided to let you join
Bravo, champ
Come see us at the guild as soon as possible
You can begin training immediately
See you there
Thank you for coming to the Munchers' Guild
I will be helping you on your journey to becoming the BIGGEST Muncher
First, we must head outside
I will assist you in catching your very first Munchme
Munchmes are little guys that we Munchers use for doing our dirty work
Let's go, newcomer. I will be waiting for you outside
This spot usually has some good Munchmes roaming around
Though I am not really seeing any...
Oh look, it's a Dipshit
How 'bout you go over there and try catching it
Don't worry too much about failing
Dipshits don't move much so you can keep trying until you succeed
Use left click on your mouse when you're near him to start
Sick, you caught it. Good job
Now try deploying your Dipshit from your Tummy Viewer
Open it by pressing the E key
Now send it out by dragging it to the arrow icon
There you go
You can toggle your mouse cursor visible at any time using Q
and you can drag the top of any view to move it around
You can also switch who you are controlling with the TAB key
or simply by clicking into a viewer with your mouse
Click the close button to call your Munchme back
Dipshit's unique amazing power is
It can run and jump
...and that's about it
You know what
Let's put your new munchme to the test
Bring him out once more by pressing E
If you can make it escape the cage before time runs out
you can keep it
Good luck
Too bad
I have confiscated your Dipshit due to its incompetency
Using what I've taught you,
I trust in you to find yourself a more comendable Munchme
Bye for now
